remarks: The base set of the free module is a subspace of the power module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)
statement:
frlmval.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmpws.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmlss.u $e |- U = ( LSubSp ` ( ( ringLMod ` R ) ^s I ) ) $.
frlmlss $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. W ) -> B e. U ) $.
